name: Button Men Mobile: A Mean Little Mobile Dice Game
blurb: Button Men Mobile is a truly crowd-sourced MMO strategy game based on Cheapass Games' Button Men; oh, and it likes to beat people up.

rewards.reward: No Reward
The Counted: You will receive our sincerest gratitude and your name will be added to a special in-game easter egg
The Backer: You will receive a reserved username, a Kickstarter exclusive title equal to your pledge level, and all of "The Counted" ($1) rewards
The Kickstarter: You will receive access to the 30 day private beta, unlocked Kickstarter exclusive 6-character set: Kickstarters, and all of "The Backer" ($5) rewards

The Soldier: You will receive 7 days of access to the private alpha, unlocked Soldiers 12-character set, unlocked Vampyres 6-character set, 6000 Credits for unlocks (ex: 1000 CR unlocks 1 character), and all of "The Kickstarter" ($15) rewards
The General: You will receive 6000 additional credits for unlocks (ex: 1000 CR unlocks 1 character) and all of "The Soldier" ($25) rewards

The Sage: You will receive a high quality promotional art print signed by the team, your own spot in the game credits, an additional 7 days of access to the private alpha, and all of "The General" ($35) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Prodigy: You will receive another additional 12000 credits, a randomly selected high quality character art print signed by the team, a personalized thank you note from a team member, and all of "The Sage" ($50) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Thinker: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Sage" ($50) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Master: You will receive another additional 18000 credits, an additional 7 days of access to the private alpha, a high quality character art print of your choice signed by the team, a personalized thank you note from Gale Shafer, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Sage" ($50) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Idealist: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Sage" ($50) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Planner: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Prodigy" ($75) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Omnipotent: You will receive another additional 12000 credits, an additional 7 days of access to the private alpha, another larger high quality character art print of your choice signed by the team, double credits forever, 3 more character slots for free character rotation (a 6000 CR unlock), and all of "The Master" ($125) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Drafter: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Prodigy" ($75) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Artisan: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Master" ($125) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Creator: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Master" ($125) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Architect: You will create your own custom Button Men according to the guidelines for this pledge level, the set that your character is included in will be unlocked, you will get a high quality art print of your character signed by the team, a PDF book of every piece of artwork and its info, and all of "The Master" ($125) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Primeval: You will receive another additional 12000 credits, early access to the game during development (pre-alpha releases) to see the game go through from the beginning, maximum free character rotation slots (14000 CR valued unlock), and all of "The Omnipotent" ($250) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Collaborator: You will be included in the development process. You will be invited to weekly meetings (digitally), get important emails, see artwork as it is created, provide input to team members, get collaborator privileges (read-only developer privileges) inside of the game, and all of "The Primeval" ($500) rewards. (International Backers please add $10 for shipping)

The Commander: You will create your own 6-character set following the guidelines for "The Creator" pledge level, you will get a larger high quality art print of your character set signed by the team, a high quality art print of each character in your set signed by the team, all shipping costs covered, and all of "The Omnipotent" ($250) rewards.

The One: You will receive the prestige of being the only user with this special title, all unlocks, a high quality art print of every character, all shipping costs covered, and all of "The Collaborator" ($1000) rewards.
